name: Developer Simulator
description:
Do you want to know how it feels to be a game developer? Then, here you are a simulator for you who want to feel being a game developer.

Customization
You could use a custom Image and music
Make Developer folder in your internal storage
Name it Wallpaper.png for your custom Wallpaper
Name it 001.png for custom start task bar button
Name it 002.png for custom more task bar button
Name it 003.png for custom empty battery task bar icon
Name it 004.png for custom full battery task bar icon
Name it 005.png for custom wifi task bar icon
Name it 006.png for custom volume task bar icon
Put any *.mp3 file for custom music
